text: Patricia Deutsch Ross (born Elaine Patricia Deutsch; December 16, 1943 â€“ July 26, 2017) was an American actress. She was best known for appearing the television game show Match Game in the 1970s. She was also known for doing voices in animated movies. Deutsch was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Deutsch died in Los Angeles, California from cancer on July 26, 2017 at the age of 73. ==Filmography== ===Animated Roles=== * Capitol Critters - Trixie * The Emperor's New School - Mata the Lunch Lady * The Smurfs - Additional Voices * Time Squad - Amelia Earheart ===Film Roles=== * Happily N'Ever After - Additional Voices * Jetsons: The Movie - Lucy 2 * Kronk's New Groove - Waitress * Monsters, Inc. - Additional Voices * Tarzan - Tantor's Mother * The Emperor's New Groove - Waitress * The Incredibles - Stratogale * The Land Before Time VII: The Stone of Cold Fire - Rainbow Face #2 ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1943 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from Pittsburgh Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Pittsburgh
title: Patti Deutsch
